[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":["使用 React 开发者工具检查 React ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/your-first-component","children":"components"}],"，编辑 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/passing-props-to-a-component","children":"props"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/state-a-components-memory","children":"state"}],"，并识别性能问题。"]}]}],"

",["$r","li",null,{"children":"如何安装 React 开发者工具"}],"
"]}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"browser-extension","children":"浏览器扩展 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"调试 React 构建的网站最简单的办法就是安装 React 开发者工具浏览器扩展。它可用于几种流行的浏览器："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/react-developer-tools/fmkadmapgofadopljbjfkapdkoienihi?hl=en","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["安装 ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Chrome"}]," 扩展"]}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-CN/firefox/addon/react-devtools/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["安装 ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Firefox"}]," 扩展"]}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/react-developer-tools/gpphkfbcpidddadnkolkpfckpihlkkil","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["安装 ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Edge"}]," 扩展"]}]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["现在，如果你访问一个用 ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"React 构建"}]," 的网站，你将看到 ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Components"}]," 和 ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Profiler"}]," 面板。"]}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"/images/docs/react-devtools-extension.png","alt":"React Developer Tools extension"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"safari-and-other-browsers","children":"Safari 和其他浏览器 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["为其他浏览器（比如，Safari），安装 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-devtools","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-devtools"}]}]," npm 包:"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"# Yarn
yarn global add react-devtools

# Npm
npm install -g react-devtools
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"接下来从终端打开开发者工具："}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"react-devtools
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["然后通过将以下 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<script>"}]," 标签添加到你网站的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<head>"}]," 开头来连接你的网站："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-html","meta":"{3}","children":"<html>
  <head>
    <script src="http://localhost:8097"></script>
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"现在在浏览器里刷新你的网站，你可以在开发者工具里查看它。"}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"/images/docs/react-devtools-standalone.png","alt":"React Developer Tools standalone"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"mobile-react-native","children":"移动端（React Native） "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["React 开发者工具同样可检查用 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://reactnative.dev/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Native"}]," 构建的应用程序。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"使用 React 开发者工具最简单的办法就是全局安装它："}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"# Yarn
yarn global add react-devtools

# Npm
npm install -g react-devtools
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"接下来从终端打开开发者工具："}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"react-devtools
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"它应该可以连接到任何正在运行的本地 React Native 应用程序。"}],"
",["$r","blockquote",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果几秒钟后开发者工具未连接，请尝试重新加载应用程序。"}],"
"]}],"
